organic.title: How to Launch Download Management
organic.snippet: From the Wii U Menu: The Download Management icon is located in the bottom-right corner of the Wii U Menu. Select it twice to open Download Management.

organic.title: How to Use the Nintendo 3DS Download Software Repair ...
organic.snippet: Tap OK, followed by Download to initiate the repair process. The repair process will download the software again without overwriting the software's save data.
